content: > join my facebook group for community > coupons and cal challenges > > take me to the group 1 yarn peaches & creme stripey medium #4 100% cotton 102 yds/93 m per 2 oz/56 7 g skein color a flannel 1 skein tools us size g/6 4 00mm crochet hook stitch markers finished sizes 5 flat 10 around x 11 5 tall without handles stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch pattern notes pattern is worked from the bottom up in one solid piece use a st marker to mark the top of the first st in each new round 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
